= Installation Introduction =

This software has been developed to run under Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS and 12.04 LTS, but should also work on other Linux distributions and versions. Installation requires minimal understanding of how to use and administer Linux systems.

Start with:
  * [InstallationBasic Basic Setup]

Continue with the other optional installation depending on requirements:
  * [InstallationWebInterface Web Interface]
  * [InstallationWeather Web Interface External Temperature]
  * [InstallationTimeSync Time Synchronisation]
